name: Past/Preset/Future
description: Examines the past, illuminates the present, and reveals potential future outcomes.

positions.name: Past
Present
Future

name: Challenges & Obstacles
description: For everyday insights. Clarifies situation, decision, or relationship dynamics.

positions.name: What do I need to understand about my current situation?
What are the potential challenges or obstacles?
What can I do to effectively overcome these challenges?

name: Celtic Cross
description: For deep insights into complex situations or multifaceted questions.

positions.name: What is the heart of my current situation?
What is the main challenge or obstacle I'm facing?
What are the subconscious influences on my situation?
What does my past tell me about this situation?
What conscious influences are affecting my situation?
What does the immediate future hold if things continue as they are?
How do I perceive myself in this situation?
How do others perceive my situation or role?
What are my hopes and fears?
What is the potential outcome if I follow the current path?

name: Career Path
description: Designed for understanding career or work situations. Clarifies work challenges.

positions.name: What do I need to understand about my current career situation?
What are my strengths in this career?
What are the areas for improvement or growth in my career?
What opportunities should I be looking for?
What obstacles do I need to be aware of in my career?
What is the potential future if I continue on this career path?
What steps can I take to improve my career satisfaction?

name: Relationship Insight
description: For insights into relationship dynamics, whether romantic, familial, or platonic.

positions.name: How do I perceive the current state of our relationship?
What does the other person feel about our relationship?
What strengths do I bring to this relationship?
What strengths does the other person bring to this relationship?
What challenges am I facing in this relationship?
What challenges does the other person face in this relationship?
What is the potential future of this relationship?

name: Self-Discovery
description: For personal introspection, especially at crossroads or personal growth stages.

positions.name: What do I need to understand about myself right now?
What strengths do I currently possess?
What personal qualities do I need to develop at this time?
What is blocking my personal growth?
How can I overcome this block?
What does my inner self want me to know?

name: Relationship Problem
description: Sheds light on relationship problems. Helps understand cause, viewpoints, and solutions.

positions.name: How does the main problem appear?
What is the source of the problem?
How do I perceive the problem?
How does my partner perceive the problem?
What am I willing/plan to do to solve the problem?
What is my partner willing/plan to do to solve the problem?
What will happen if nothing is done to resolve the issue?
What can I do to influence the problem now?
